name: jackspeak
description: A very strict and proper argument parser.

scripts.build-examples: for i in examples/*.js ; do node $i -h > ${i/.js/.txt}; done
scripts.snap: TAP_SNAPSHOT=1 tap test/*.js -J && npm run build-examples
scripts.postpublish: git push origin --all; git push origin --tags
